description: If you have an attacking <link=keyword.Ephemeral><sprite name=Ephemeral><style=Keyword>Ephemeral</style></link> ally, kill <link=card.Kalgren><style=AssociatedCard>Ren Shadowblade</style></link>'s blocker.
descriptionRaw: If you have an attacking Ephemeral ally, kill Ren Shadowblade's blocker.
flavorText: "As darkness falls, shadows lengthen and lives are cut short..."
name: Fatal Strike
